In the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' released in 2011, which two songs feature lyrics written by Swanand Kirkire and Anvita Dutt Guptan?
Options:

C. Haal-E-Dil and Aaj Ki Raat

Correct Answer: Haal-E-Dil and Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
